GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Найти ядро
Спасти клон Всематери
Бежать
Вернуть Чикиту
Задержать Кали Чапека
<color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Задержать Кали Чапека - Завершено</color>

<color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Победить Роба "Скотти" - Завершено</color>
Победить Доктора Брауна 9B
<color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Победить Доктора Брауна 9B - Завершено</color>
Спустя несколько дней, на Сцилле - мире с более быстрым циклом смены дня и ночи.
Для Суверена это был всего лишь ориентир. Даже я понятия не имел, что это одно из ядер.
Это тюрьма творения Предтеч, построенная, чтобы выкачивать пси-силу из одного из клонов Всематери.
I hope you are right, and this "clone" will help us against her grown-up, evil version.
If the secret texts saved in my memory are true, the immature clone will be hibernating, reminiscent of an item ... sort of a relic. So we won't find out until it awakens.

Fate of the universe, blah blah ... I'd rather stay by the ship. I used to smuggle stuff through these parts. There is a UNSS fort west, and the only reason they do not come here is that the local Tumori are bloodthirsty buggers.
Ok, Kali, but guard it as the apple of your eye.
After some time.
We have the Relic! Now, back to the ship. It's only a matter of time till this place is crawling with UNSS soldiers, regardless of the Tumori.
Yep. We can figure out how to wake the Relic up in some safer place.
Chiquita is gone! And Kali too ...
... No! Kali could not fly off! I did not trust him with access codes! ... wait a minute!
[RADIO STATIC] Kali! Do you hear me?! You were supposed to guard Chiquita! Where is it?
What is this supposed to mean?!
If you at least pretended we're saving Manny, instead of your "space gods ... universe span ... shit", I may have let myself to be fed by your lies a little bit longer, kiddo.
What are you waiting for, Mr Chapek?! Seize them!
You see, that Hesperidian gentleman gave me the access codes he harvested from #925's head. So I found a better "parking spot".
You are so dead, Kali, you just don't know it yet!
I don't think so. Lay down your weapons. You are surrounded!
All we are surrounded by is fear. Fear and dead men!
Fall back, fall back! Doctor Brown, we need reinforcements!
Gergielarh, there will be no reinforcements, human! My forces' advance is slowed down by the terrain and the Tumori! You and your pirates must do your part!
Did you hear that? I don't think they had enough time to set a proper trap.
We must press on and shoot our way to Chiquita! But first, we force Kali to tell us where it's parked.
Kali must have hidden himself elsewhere.
Kali told me you two found a rare artifact. Surrender it, or there will be consequences!
That idiot Kali said you would be an easy prey!
We had a deal, Doctor Brown! I need your help!
Deal? What deal? You were supposed to hinder their advance till our Fossorian "allies" move to their positions, stupid human. I don't need you anymore.
Not shiny!
Where's the bloody road?!
It's over, Kali! The Hesperidian used you and then left you behind.
You have done the same!
I thought you'd kill me.
No, you don't deserve to die, just a proper kick in the balls.
I ... the Hesperidian promised he would let Manny go if I snitch on you! But then he wanted Chiquita, and then you!
I am Sorry, Kali. He played you ... and I played you too. You are not an evil man, just dangerously naive.
Chiquita is here, kiddo ...
... behind a Primal's gate. But I believe one of the Fossorians has the key ... I am sorry.
I know you are ... go ...
What?
I owe it to Manny ... fly, you fool, go save her!
Kiddo ... I ...
The Cyberbug in me would say you're getting soft, Starling. And my human part didn't see that coming either.
Sometimes I surprise even myself. Maybe I'm becoming soft. But now, let's go squeeze the keys from the Fossorians.
So much for the softness.
Remember what I told you, Moletoff! You will bring the new Relic to me, not to the Hesperidian. Till I have it, the UNSS will continue to treat us like shit!
Yes, Supreme Leader! I will not disappoint you.
Commander ... erm ... Lieutenant Moletoff!
Shut your filthy mouth, abominable halfbreed! I am speaking to Supreme Leader Furret!
... and, Moletoff, not a single word about our plan in front the Hesperidian! Only you, Molson, and Hack know!
Understood.
Erm ... Commander, the Sovereigns!
What!?
DAMN! You'll give me a heart attack! Why did nobody warn me! I am surrounded by halfbreed imbeciles!
And you, pirate, have something my Supreme Leader wants! Give it to me, or I'll skin you alive!
Give me the Relic!
The Supreme Leader wants the Relic for himself! I'll be his number one after I take it from your cold hands!
The Relic, give it to me! Come on, Furret will be mad at me if I fail.
The Sovereigns are runners, not fighters. This will be too easy.
Listen, you two, you have no idea how powerful the Relic is. IT WILL BEND YOU LIKE A TWIG!!! ... Give it to one of my boys before it's too late!
As usually, the key is probably with the last one!
He was supposed to snap their necks the Fossorian way! Instead, he just lost like an amateur! ... I am not used to sitting in the rear! I must intervene.
No way! To the UNSS, you are too precious alive. And stop using the open channel!
I will use whatever channel I see fit! General Truda, take command of our forces and show those stinky pirates what the Fossorians are capable of!
As you wish, Supreme Leader!
All Fossorians have been defeated, but neither of them had the key. Perhaps the control mechanism is in one of their bases.
All Fossorians have been defeated, but we found nothing! No key, no control panel in the bases!
Once again, Fossorians proved to be "most worthy" allies.
My Fossorians spilled their blood down there, while your men sat and picked their noses, you overgrown flour parasite. To hell with this alliance!
Your funny little mole-men were just a distraction. By now, some of our units have closed the distance. Witness how the real soldiers do their work.
Alpha, ready!
Bravo, in position!
So, the Fossorians were just decoys? We lost so much time! How do we get through the gate? ... How about using the Relic? That Thing on Chimera could open the Primals' gates like nothing.
Our Relic is still hibernating. One problem after another. Let's deal with the UNSS commanders first.
While my forces kept you busy, our dreadnought UNSS Rickenbacker maneuvered to the right position. Now, you will witness the firepower superiority of the UNSS fleet!
Commander, we have spotted orbital aiming lasers!
We are so stupid! Orbital bombardment will level the whole area! Tin, what do we do now?!
For starters, we get our asses from the impact zone! Then we hide inside the core, it's the most resilient ...
... I got a better idea!
Zane! How? You were locked down!
No bars can hold someone with my intellect. But I have no intention to brag ...
I got a "friend" capable of turning on the light bridges here ...
... and here. My friend knows the way around these parts; maybe he can even get you inside the UNSS fortress.
I don't trust you, you batshit crazy ...
I am also in an area that will be bombarded, you idiots!! Always nice to chat about the trust, but we need to GET MOVING!
Yes, we can shoot each other later.
A new commander has joined your army.
Damn! He did not exaggerate! The whole area has been destroyed!
Every subsequent hit will be more precise.
Orbital bombardment is beyond expensive, but Black Well of Nadir, what a sight!
Like the rats, the Sovereigns run to the jet unsinked part of the boat.
To UNSS Rickenbacker. Cease fire! Repeat, cease fire! Our little Sovereign problem is solved.

The whole area is scorched earth now, no resources, no fresh recruits, and I forgot my toothbrush at the base ... which is also no more ... Tin, tell me that there is a bright side, or I will lose it.
Don't you understand, Starling? It's the best possible result! The UNSS will consider us dead! We can just walk away ...
No ... WE can't. Only YOU can. I will be recognized at every UNSS checkpoint, and as the truth about Annika, the "Hero" of Kelvin went public, Sovereigns will be after my head too ...
You know I will not walk away without you. With Chiquita, we will be beyond reach of both UNNS and Sovereigns alike.
Then we have no option but to storm the UNSS fort.
So it's decided ... but first, Zane, we owe your friend a big thanks.
--,,..,,I am Man-Eater----...--.,,- I am friend...----.
You never mentioned your "friend" is a Tumori body snatcher, Zane!
I was silent about this on purpose because I know how xenophobic you two are!
Tumori monster or not, we owe him.
Ok, I got it. No burning this alien. The UNSS fortress is our priority.
...-,,Man-Eater......know secret path,,,---path to fortress ....Man-Eater...--- will eat man for you ...---.
,,,---kill my enemies---.,,kill man lovers,..-
-...--,,..---...,,man lovers banished Man-Eater,.,locked friends of Man-Eater-,,,--,,-
So this Man-Eater ... offers to join us and show us a secret path behind the gate if we help it to take care of its Tumori enemies?
I've understood it the same way.
[Signs] Meddling in a tribal war, just what we needed.
Truer words were never spoken!
A new commander has joined your army.
....---Carnivora friend.....-Carnivora free again..----,,,,Carnivora will eat man..----..later..,
Why did I just remember Pandora's box?
....---Crimson Malice friend..--,.,Crimson Malice free.----,-,,,-,Crimson Malice come later...,,,,,,-,-,-,-,Crimson Malice help later...-.,
Another crazy Tumori walks free. Allmother help us!
You two don't realize, but this is a historic moment. Tumori and humans act synergistically for the first time! The initial step on the path to understanding between two alien cultures!
True, what a nice friendship. I think I will puke some screws and nuts, so much I am moved!
Zane, we are helping them kill their own, so they would help us kill our own!
Not the most glorious start, I admit ... but still, the most significant achievement!
---Man-Eater no liar...,,,look..-...path ...---,,path through the rocks ...,,--path to fortress.,,
If you take this path, there will be no way back.
A few moments later, on the other side of the rocks.
See, we got inside the fortress. My friend kept the word it gave, and also revealed to me that the a lot of the liberated Tumori are hiding inside. They are ready to assist during the fight.
You are a one-of-a-kind specimen, Zane. But still, thank you ... I guess.
Worlds of praise mean nothing to me, but the bridge between men and Tumori we built this day will change the world forever.
You shouldn't have requested her assistance, Brown! There is no way the Sovereigns or the core could have survived the bombardment.
Same as the remnants of my forces and the Fossorian bases the Sovereigns occupied!
I did not summon Her. She wanted to check! The cores are extremely resilient, and the clones in their "relic" state as well. She wants to know for sure.
WATCH OUT! They are alive and managed to get behind our perimeter!
Me, Scotty, and Furret will take care of them! General Takeshi, inform Her of our situation!
...-TUMORI-,, EAT MAN NOW..--TO WAR--.,,,
.-...--Eat Outworlders...---
We are surrounded!
Stand and fight!
Screw this! Too much Fossorian blood was spilled while the UNSS pulled the strings from safety! I am out of here!
Fall back to the last base, behind the Primals' gate!
A few moments later.
Going somewhere?
I bet you consider me a coward in a lab coat, Miss Finch, but I won't make it easy for you. And once She arrives, I will watch your arrogant smile disappear.
Open the gate to Chiquita, and I will grant you a quick death!
I do not fear death, but I do not intend to suffer. Here. Take the key. It won't help you anyway. "From Black Well of Nadir She came, and no gate will stop Her!"
HE BELONGS TO ME!
Damn!
--...-DANGER--...DANGER--...
Tumori can sense when it's time to run! If luck were a real phenomenon, I'd wish it upon you! Farewell.
Quick, Starling, let's open the gate!
Get inside, Tin!
Starling! What are you doing?!
I am sorry, Tin. If I go with you, I'll make us a bigger target. I've crossed too many people, know too much, and I am a danger to you.
NO! WE made it! The way to Chiquita is clear!
This gate will never stop her, and neither can I, but I can give you time. Chiquita engines must preheat, remember?
Starling ... ANNIKA!!!
Do not waste this chance! I will give her hell for both of us!
ANNIKA, THE HERO OF KELVIN, WHAT A SURPRISE. I THOUGHT YOU'D RUN, SACRIFICE A FRIEND, OR TRY TO JOIN ME, LIKE YOU ALWAYS DID.
I guess I am not wired that way anymore.
COME TO ME, MY BRAVE CHILD. COME TO DIE.
I am sure you will make it worth it, Tin.
